dateline.name: Mrs: Susan Stafford
Kirkwood | (Glendale) | New Jersey
This postal card is postmarked: Camden, N.J. | May 8 | 1(?) M | 87. This postal card also contains printed text (lower left-hand corner): WALT WHITMAN | CAMDEN, | NEW JERSEY.
